abstract: Mr. Taylor, 56, is the president of Stonehill & Taylor, an architecture and interior design firm based in New York.
snippet: Mr. Taylor, 56, is the president of Stonehill & Taylor, an architecture and interior design firm based in New York.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Taylor, 56, is the president of Stonehill & Taylor, an architecture and interior design firm based in New York. The company specializes in the hospitality industry, and its projects have included the Ace and Crosby Street hotels, along with the Plaza Hotel before its recent sale. It is currently working on the NoMad Hotel in Manhattan and a new extended-stay brand for Hyatt.
